message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $20000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $20000 might be a stretch for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $18000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $16000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand that $16000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $17000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $17000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $15500 for the product. Would you be willing to consider that?
